title: Moonstone Romance
description: Cal Rider couldn't think of anything worse than having his adopted brother, Rylan, be his mate. Rylan is cruel, selfish, and unbelievably possessive. Cal can't even breath with Rylan leering over his shoulder, scaring away what little friends he has. Why is Rylan so scared someone will take him away? Not only does he deal with his possessive boyfriend, but Kasper returns with two wolves with a dark past and dark secret that'll have Moonstone riled up once again in another epic drama!
author: rotxinxpieces
